name: Sonic Tracker
text: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Transonic Bird". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 4 or more. The Special Summoned monster's Level becomes equal to the total Levels of the monsters used for its Ritual Summon. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Ritual Monster you control; send 1 Ritual Monster with the same Type and/or Attribute as that face-up monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Sonic Tracker" once per turn.
